description: The webhook payload for the portout.status_changed event

id.description: Identifies the port out that was moved.

status.description: The new status of the port out.

phone_numbers.description: Phone numbers associated with this port-out order

carrier_name.description: Carrier the number will be ported out to

user_id.description: Identifies the user that the port-out order belongs to.

subscriber_name.description: The name of the port-out's end user.

rejection_reason.description: The reason why the order is being rejected by the user. If the order is authorized, this field can be left null

attempted_pin.description: The PIN that was attempted to be used to authorize the port out.
